title: Font identification for gupuds.com?
content:
hi everybody,

i’d like to know what font is used on [http://www.gupuds.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080921083320/http:/www.gupuds.com/ "http://www.gupuds.com/"), on the flash animation.

help is greatly appreciated.

thank you :-)

 [‹ any ideas what this is?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080921083320/http:/typophile.com/node/49398 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font Like Lancome ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080921083320/http:/typophile.com/node/49205 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Anke Gaksch

comments.content: thank you so much!!!! that was quick :-)
